title: Data Center Network Equipment Upgrade
description: Upgrade core network switches and routers in primary data center as part of IT modernization project. Requires coordination with TechInnovate team for seamless integration with new cloud infrastructure.

title: Firewall Configuration for Cloud Integration
description: Configure enterprise firewall rules to allow secure communication between on-premise systems and new cloud infrastructure. Requires GlobalSecure security review and approval.

title: ERP System Integration with Analytics Platform
description: Establish data pipeline between enterprise ERP system and new DataFlow analytics platform. Includes ETL configuration, data mapping, and initial data load.

title: Cloud Infrastructure Monitoring Setup
description: Configure comprehensive monitoring and alerting for all cloud infrastructure components. Includes performance monitoring, security event tracking, and automated incident response.

title: Staff Training - Analytics Platform
description: Organize comprehensive training sessions for business analysts and department heads on the new DataFlow analytics platform. Training should cover platform navigation, report creation, and self-service analytics.
